actions.OOM: Increase memory / reduce batch size / enable gradient checkpointing
actions.CUDA_Driver_Mismatch: Align driver and CUDA toolkit versions; verify nvidia-smi vs torch.cuda details
actions.CUDA_OutOfMemory: Reduce batch size / use mixed precision / accumulate gradients
actions.DataLoader_Stuck: Check num_workers, deadlocks, dataset __getitem__, and worker timeouts
actions.Disk_Full: Clean cache/checkpoints; expand persistent volume; rotate logs
actions.Permission_Denied: Fix file/directory permissions; check container security context
actions.Network_Timeout: Validate data source endpoints; increase timeouts; add retries
actions.Model_Code_Error: Run unit tests; enable anomaly detection; inspect stacktrace
